unnormalised: Hanv aiz *sabzi mandi*nt aslom. Mhaka dislem tevhoddlem sopeponn naslem. Tujea jivitak mellto ani tuka sogllem yeta mhunn tuka dista, ani magir tum Sharmaji kodden 1/2 kg *bhindi* gheunk voita. Lokachea jivitachi hi asli vostu. *Tolamni* ani dubavit dolleamni tem mhunzlolem asta.
normalised: Haanv aaz *sabzi mandi*-nt aslom. Mhunn’ya, to ek anubhav aslo. Tumkam khobor asa, tumi atam vhodd zaleat ani vhoddleanchea kamank samballunk zata mhunn tumi chintat, ani magir tumi Sharmaji-chea lagim adho kilo *bhindi* gheunk vavurtat. Sangharsh khorench asa, lokanno. Sangharshak *tolas*-ant ani dubhavit nodrentlean mezpak yeta.

unnormalised: Poilem mhunnllear, nimme vellar, dukandar fattim ravon “Bas, beta, ho gaya.” (Punn zalem, puta). Ani tum thaim ubho rauta ani tum chint’ta, "Tem khorench 500 gram asa? Vo Sharmaji fattim ravon purannim *palak* diunko sodta?" Mhojem mon udveg zatlem. Hanv soput gheun sangtam, tannim *sabzi mandi* dukandarachea xallent "Thoddi Andaz Kaddpachi Kala" vixoy xikoitat. Te xallechea pustokant “Voddlea Andazacheo Technicao” ani “Gramanchem Borem Vicharamni Rupantor” asat.
normalised: Poile suvater, adhea vellar, dukanidar fakt *eyeball* korta. “Bas, beta, ho gaya.” Ani tumi thoim ube ravun chintat, “Tem khorench panchso gram asa? Vo Sharmaji ekdom sukhi *palak* ditalo?” Mhojea monantlean kitlyo vostu yetat. Mhaka dista, *sabzi mandi* dukanidarachea school-ant “The Art of the Approximation” vixoy xikoytat. Tanchea pustokant “Advanced Guessing Techniques” ani “Converting Grams to Good Vibes” asonk xakta.

unnormalised: Ani magir *dharam kanta* asa. Oh, *dharam kanta*! Tem sodanch odd asa. Tem Pisa-cho zunklo stombh bhaxen asa, punn bhaji palliank. Ek vatten dusreat poros vhoddlem vhozon asta, punn soglle zann asat ki tem porinnam zala mhunn. Dukandar tem bhorunk ani sangta, “Ek kilo!” (Ek kilo!) ani tum mhunta, "Borem dista." Punn tum ghora voita, tum tem tujea digital scale-ar dovorta, ani tem fokot 900 gm asta. Mhaka borea nirnnoyacho mog asa, punn mhaka mhoje pure kilo batate mhojea Aloo Tikki khatir zai!
normalised: Magir *dharam kanta* asa. Oh, *dharam kanta*! Tem sodanch thoddem tigelem asta. Tem Pisa-chea tigelea minar-achem bhaxen, punn bhajekhatir. Ek vatten dusre vatten poros bhari asta, punn soglle dhong kortat ki tem ekdom borem asa. Dukanidar tem bhorun, “Ek kilo!” mhunn sangta ani tumi mhunn’t, “Thik asa, disun thik dista.” Punn, tumi ghora yetat, tumche shandar dijital-chea tarajecher dovortat, ani tem fakt novexim gram asta. Mhaka bori sodebari avodta, punn mhaka mhoje purn kilo batate mhaka mhoje Aloo Tikki-khatir zai!

unnormalised: Ani *paav* gheuche vixayant mhojek sanvondunk naka. Ek *paav* mhunllear 250 gram, sarke? Tor, char *paav* mhunllear ek kilo. Sopem ganit. Punn, *sabzi mandi*nt kainch sopem na. Soglleamni geomitrache niyom moddunk ekzat zalea mhunn dista. "Do *paav* tamatar, ek *paav* pyaaz, aur *aadha paav* dhaniya." (Don *paav* tamatar, ek *paav* piyaz, ani adho *paav* kotmiri.) Tum order ditach tumkam calculator ani ek bolli chai zai poddtta.
normalised: Ani *paav*-an vostu gheuchea vixoyant mhaka suru korunk naka. Ek *paav* mhunntlear donxim ani ponchvis gram, khoreponnan? Mhunn’tlear, char *paav* mhunntlear ek kilo. Sopea hisoban. Punn, *sabzi mandi*-nt kainch sope na. Mhaka bore bhaxen dukhovche khatir soglle bhumitiche niyam moddunk raji zatat. "Don *paav* tamatar, ek *paav* pyaaz, ani *aadha paav* dhaniya." Tumi order ditat tedna tumkam calculator ani chaviachi goroz poddtta.

unnormalised: Hasonneacho vixoy mhunllear all’lle ani losunn gheunko vochnnem. Te sodanch vichartat "kitna?" (kitlem?) ani tum mhunta "Rs. 20 ka de do" (mhaka 20 rupiank div). Magir te tuka all’lleacho ek dhaktto tukddo ditat zo tujo chaik fokot don kapam khatir ruchikartolo. Mhunnje fuddlea vellar hanv “100 gm of ginger” magtolo just teanchi reaction polleunk!
normalised: Hanstele vost mhunntlear aalle ani lossun gheunk vavurta tedna. Te sodanch vichartat "kitna?" ani tumi mhunn’t "rupees twenty ka de do". Magir te tumkam aalleacho ek lhan tukdo ditat ani tumche chaviak don cup-am khatir khub kami ruch dita. Dekhun fattim hanv "one hundred gram of ginger" magtolo tanche reaction polleunche khatir!

unnormalised: Punn aik, andazache map ani dukandarachea sundor (ucharan: thodde chukichea) vikreche ritim astana passun, hanv *sabzi mandi*cho anubhav koslich vostu gheunk sodinam. Tem dhonndvallichem, tem rongit, ani tem tuka tuzo ganv sodchea xikte khatir bori zaga. Ani, dusrea khoim tuka *lauki*che pusttik labhacher ek veakhean melltta kiteak tum ek zatak ganjallem vhozon ulkauta? Fokot Bharotant ek dis, gramamni, rupiamni ani khoob hansea mazta.
normalised: Punn hey, lagichea mezpank lagun ani dukanidaranche sundor (vichar: thodde cholovpache) vikri taktik-anchea astanantui, hanv *sabzi mandi*-ntlea onubhavacho bodol kosleantui korunk naslomm. Tem dhondallachem, tem rongit ani tumchea molbhav korpachea gunnank vaprunk ekdom bori zaga. Ani kitle zageancher tumi *lauki*-chea postik faideancher ek bhaxonn aikunk xektat ani eka purnn zongallea vajanacho arth kaddunk vavurtat? Bharatantlea ek dis, mezpachem gram, rupiya ani bore bhaxen haso.

unnormalised: Ani aizkalchea yugacher nazar dovruiam. Tum online order korpak nirnnoy gheta, tum *sabzi mandi*che udvegapasun bhair sortam mhunn chintun. Punn tumchi “1 kg” piyzanchi bag ieta, ani tanche modlea adheonche golleo bhaxen astat. Tem ekdom jivem asa tumkam mapchea ekankachi bhognni divpak. Mhunnje, tem Sharmaji-chem *dharam kanta* vo online dukandarachem dhakttea piyaz, bhaji pallianchi mapni zori cholta astach!
normalised: Ani naviskarachem modd dekhileak visarunk favo na. Tumi online order diunk tharaitat, *sabzi mandi*-ntle trasantle bhair vochunk. Punn magir tumchem "ek kilogram" piaynchea beg yeta, ani tanchea adheank gotteachea akarache asta. Hem porikshanant tumkam mezpachea ekkan vishayik tharunk asti. Mhunn’tlear, tem Sharmaji-chem *dharam kanta* aso vo online kiranhiche lhan piyao, khoreponnan mezlele bhaje vaparunchea khatir choltanch asta!
